name: Retro Basketball (Enea Nako)
description:
RETRO BASEKTBALL Overall

Get into basketball with a retro basketball game from the 1980s! Compete against a buddy or the computer to become the greatest Retro Player of all time!

PVP

Play player vs player mode.  Can block shoots, make half courts and (kind of) juke!

Player vs CPU

Play against a fair CPU, makes some shoots and plays some average defense.

Practice

Play practice mode and test your range. 

Controls

Player 1: WASD and Spacebar to shoot 

Player 2: Arrow Keys and P to shoot

NOTE: For versions after 1.2, only Player 1 has gamepad support.  For gamepad support, you must set your own controls.

PLAY ON OUR WEBSITE FOR THE NEWEST UPDATES!

Retro Basketball Official Website
